decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (110-P3; Planning Statement; Received 30/06/2017; JNY8791-06; 3135/0072/A1/03; Received 11/09/2017; JNY8791-06; Received 12/09/2017.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - Before the use hereby approved commences, details of cycle parking shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority and the spaces as approved shall be available for use before first occupation of any part of the development.

Condition : 4 - Prior to the use hereby permitted, a Car Park Management Plan shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The unit shall thereafter operate in accordance with the approved Plan.
description: Change of use of existing premises from industrial and ancillary offices to car licence testing (sui generis use).
